Contribute to Dyad

I very much welcome contributions to Dyad. If you would like to contribute feedback then please email me. If you would like to contribute code then please fork the repository and make a pull request. For guidance on this, see Github’s advice.

Report problems with Dyad

You can report problems with Dyad using the repository’s Issues page.

Seek support

You can seek support by emailing me. I will be very happy to help.
